00070 SyxParser *
00071 syx_parser_new (SyxLexer *lexer, SyxOop method, SyxOop klass)
00072 {
00073   SyxParser *self;
00074   if (!lexer || !SYX_IS_OBJECT (method))
00075     return NULL;
00076   
00077   self = (SyxParser *) syx_malloc (sizeof (SyxParser));
00078 
00079   self->lexer = lexer;
00080   self->method = method;
00081   self->klass = klass;
00082   self->_in_block = FALSE;
00083 
00084   self->bytecode = syx_bytecode_new ();
00085   self->_temporary_scopes_top = 0;
00086   self->_argument_scopes_top = 0;
00087   self->instance_names = syx_class_get_all_instance_variable_names (klass);
00088 
00089   self->_duplicate_indexes_top = 0;
00090 
00091   return self;
00092 }
00093 
00094 void
00095 _syx_scope_free (SyxParserScope *scope)
00096 {
00097   int i;
00098   for (i=0; i < scope->top; i++)
00099     syx_free (scope->stack[i]);
00100 }
00101 
00102 /* Free current temporary scopes and arguments */
00103 void
00104 _syx_parser_free_temporaries (SyxParser *self)
00105 {
00106   _syx_scope_free (self->_temporary_scopes + self->_temporary_scopes_top);
00107 }
00108 
00109 void
00110 _syx_parser_free_arguments (SyxParser *self)
00111 {
00112   _syx_scope_free (self->_argument_scopes + self->_argument_scopes_top);
00113 }
00114 
00120 void
00121 syx_parser_free (SyxParser *self, syx_bool free_segment)
00122 {
00123   syx_bytecode_free (self->bytecode);
00124 
00125   if (free_segment)
00126     {
00127       if (self->instance_names)
00128         syx_free (self->instance_names);
00129       syx_lexer_free (self->lexer, TRUE);
00130     }
00131 
00132   syx_free (self);
00133 }
00134 
00140 syx_bool
00141 syx_parser_parse (SyxParser *self, syx_bool skip_message_pattern)
00142 {
00143   SyxToken token;
00144 
00145   token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00146   if (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_END)
00147     return TRUE;
00148 
00149   self->_temporary_scopes[self->_temporary_scopes_top].top = 0;
00150   self->_argument_scopes[self->_argument_scopes_top].top = 0;
00151 
00152   if (!skip_message_pattern)
00153     _syx_parser_parse_message_pattern (self);
00154 
00155   if (!self->_in_block)
00156     _syx_parser_parse_primitive (self);
00157 
00158   _syx_parser_parse_temporaries (self);
00159 
00160   if (self->_in_block)
00161     syx_bytecode_push_constant (self->bytecode, SYX_BYTECODE_CONST_NIL);
00162 
00163   _syx_parser_parse_body (self);
00164 
00165   syx_bytecode_do_special (self->bytecode, SYX_BYTECODE_SELF_RETURN);
00166 
00167   SYX_CODE_BYTECODES(self->method) = syx_byte_array_new_ref (self->bytecode->code_top * sizeof (syx_uint16),
00168                                                              (syx_uint8 *)self->bytecode->code);
00169   SYX_CODE_LITERALS(self->method) = syx_array_new_ref (self->bytecode->literals_top,
00170                                                        self->bytecode->literals);
00171   
00172   SYX_CODE_STACK_SIZE(self->method) = syx_small_integer_new (self->bytecode->stack_size + 1);
00173   SYX_CODE_TEXT(self->method) = syx_string_new (self->lexer->text +
00174                                                 syx_find_first_non_whitespace (self->lexer->text));
00175   SYX_CODE_CLASS(self->method) = self->klass;
00176 
00177   /* Free arguments and temporaries of this scope */
00178   _syx_parser_free_arguments (self);
00179   _syx_parser_free_temporaries (self);
00180 
00181   return TRUE;
00182 }
00183 
00184 static syx_varsize
00185 _syx_parser_find_temporary_name (SyxParser *self, syx_symbol name)
00186 {
00187   syx_varsize i, top, scope_index;
00188   SyxParserScope *scope;
00189   if (!name)
00190     return -1;
00191 
00192   top = 0;
00193   for (scope_index=self->_temporary_scopes_top; scope_index >= 0; scope_index--)
00194     {
00195       scope = self->_temporary_scopes + scope_index;
00196       for (i=scope->top-1; i >= 0; i--)
00197         {
00198           if (!strcmp (scope->stack[i], name))
00199             return i + top;
00200         }
00201       top += scope->top;
00202     }
00203 
00204   return -1;
00205 }
00206 
00207 static syx_varsize
00208 _syx_parser_find_argument_name (SyxParser *self, syx_symbol name)
00209 {
00210   syx_varsize i, index, scope_index;
00211   SyxParserScope *scope;
00212   if (!name)
00213     return -1;
00214 
00215   index = 0;
00216   for (scope_index=self->_argument_scopes_top; scope_index >= 0; scope_index--)
00217     {
00218       scope = self->_argument_scopes + scope_index;
00219       for (i=0; i < scope->top; i++, index++)
00220         {
00221           if (!strcmp (scope->stack[i], name))
00222             return index;
00223         }
00224     }
00225 
00226   return -1;
00227 }
00228 
00229 static syx_varsize
00230 _syx_parser_find_instance_name (SyxParser *self, syx_symbol name)
00231 {
00232   syx_varsize i;
00233 
00234   if (!self->instance_names)
00235     return -1;
00236 
00237   if (!name)
00238     return -1;
00239 
00240   for (i=0; self->instance_names[i]; i++)
00241     {
00242       if (!strcmp (self->instance_names[i], name))
00243         return i;
00244     }
00245 
00246   return -1;
00247 }
00248 
00249 static SyxOop
00250 _syx_parser_find_class_variable_name (SyxParser *self, syx_symbol name)
00251 {
00252   SyxOop klass = self->klass;
00253   SyxOop binding;
00254 
00255   if (syx_object_get_class (klass) == syx_metaclass_class)
00256     klass = SYX_METACLASS_INSTANCE_CLASS (klass);
00257 
00258   for (; !SYX_IS_NIL(klass); klass=SYX_CLASS_SUPERCLASS(klass))
00259     {
00260       binding = syx_dictionary_binding_at_symbol_if_absent (SYX_CLASS_CLASS_VARIABLES (klass), name, syx_nil);
00261       if (!SYX_IS_NIL (binding))
00262         return binding;
00263     }
00264 
00265   return syx_nil;
00266 }
00267 
00268 static syx_bool
00269 _syx_parser_parse_term (SyxParser *self)
00270 {
00271   SyxToken token = syx_lexer_get_last_token (self->lexer);
00272   syx_bool super_term = FALSE;
00273   switch (token.type)
00274     {
00275     case SYX_TOKEN_NAME_CONST:
00276       super_term = _syx_parser_parse_name_term (self, token.value.string);
00277       syx_token_free (token);
00278       break;
00279     case SYX_TOKEN_STR_CONST:
00280       syx_bytecode_push_literal (self->bytecode, syx_string_new (token.value.string));
00281       syx_token_free (token);
00282       break;
00283     case SYX_TOKEN_INT_CONST:
00284       syx_bytecode_push_literal (self->bytecode, syx_small_integer_new (token.value.integer));
00285       syx_token_free (token);
00286       break;
00287 #ifdef HAVE_LIBGMP
00288     case SYX_TOKEN_LARGE_INT_CONST:
00289       syx_bytecode_push_literal (self->bytecode,
00290                                  syx_large_integer_new_mpz (token.value.large_integer));
00291       syx_token_free (token);
00292       break;
00293 #endif
00294     case SYX_TOKEN_FLOAT_CONST:
00295       syx_bytecode_push_literal (self->bytecode, syx_float_new (token.value.floating));
00296       syx_token_free (token);
00297       break;
00298     case SYX_TOKEN_SYM_CONST:
00299       syx_bytecode_push_literal (self->bytecode, syx_symbol_new (token.value.string));
00300       syx_token_free (token);
00301       break;
00302     case SYX_TOKEN_CHAR_CONST:
00303       syx_bytecode_push_literal (self->bytecode, syx_character_new (token.value.character));
00304       syx_token_free (token);
00305       break;
00306     case SYX_TOKEN_ARRAY_BEGIN:
00307       syx_bytecode_push_literal (self->bytecode, _syx_parser_parse_literal_array (self));
00308       syx_token_free (token);
00309       break;
00310     case SYX_TOKEN_BINARY:
00311       if (!strcmp (token.value.string, "("))
00312         {
00313           syx_token_free (token);
00314           token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00315           _syx_parser_parse_expression (self);
00316           token = syx_lexer_get_last_token (self->lexer);
00317           if (! (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_CLOSING && token.value.character == ')'))
00318             syx_signal (SYX_ERROR_INTERP, syx_string_new ("Expected ) after sub expression"));
00319           break;
00320         }
00321       else if (!strcmp (token.value.string, "["))
00322         {
00323           _syx_parser_parse_block (self);
00324           break;
00325         }
00326       else if (!strcmp (token.value.string, "{"))
00327         {
00328           _syx_parser_parse_array (self);
00329           break;
00330         }
00331       else if (!strcmp (token.value.string, "-"))
00332         {
00333           syx_token_free (token);
00334           token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00335           if (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_INT_CONST)
00336             syx_bytecode_push_literal (self->bytecode, syx_small_integer_new (-token.value.integer));
00337 
00338 #ifdef HAVE_LIBGMP
00339           else if (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_LARGE_INT_CONST)
00340             {
00341               mpz_neg (*token.value.large_integer, *token.value.large_integer);
00342               syx_bytecode_push_literal (self->bytecode,
00343                                          syx_large_integer_new_mpz (token.value.large_integer));
00344             }
00345 #endif /* HAVE_LIBGMP */
00346 
00347           else if (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_FLOAT_CONST)
00348             syx_bytecode_push_literal (self->bytecode, syx_float_new (-token.value.floating));
00349           else
00350             syx_signal(SYX_ERROR_INTERP, syx_string_new ("Negation not followed by number"));
00351 
00352           syx_token_free (token);
00353           break;
00354         }
00355       /* We continue here because of weird binary token used as expression start */
00356 
00357     default:
00358       switch (token.type)
00359         {
00360         case SYX_TOKEN_END:
00361           syx_signal (SYX_ERROR_INTERP, syx_string_new ("Unexpected end of input"));
00362           break;
00363         case SYX_TOKEN_STRING_ENTRY:
00364           syx_signal (SYX_ERROR_INTERP, syx_string_new ("Invalid expression start: %s", token.value.string));
00365           syx_token_free (token);
00366           break;
00367         case SYX_TOKEN_CLOSING:
00368           syx_signal (SYX_ERROR_INTERP, syx_string_new ("Unexpected closing: %c", token.value.character));
00369           break;
00370         default:
00371           syx_signal (SYX_ERROR_INTERP, syx_string_new ("Expected expression"));
00372           break;
00373         }
00374     }
00375 
00376   syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00377   return super_term;
00378 }
00379 
00380 static syx_bool
00381 _syx_parser_parse_name_term (SyxParser *self, syx_symbol name)
00382 {
00383   syx_varsize pos;
00384   SyxOop binding;
00385 
00386   if (!strcmp (name, "self") || !strcmp (name, "super"))
00387     {
00388       syx_bytecode_push_argument (self->bytecode, 0);
00389       if (!strcmp (name, "super"))
00390         return TRUE;
00391       return FALSE;
00392     }
00393 
00394   if (!strcmp (name, "nil"))
00395     {
00396       syx_bytecode_push_constant (self->bytecode, SYX_BYTECODE_CONST_NIL);
00397       return FALSE;
00398     }
00399   else if (!strcmp (name, "true"))
00400     {
00401       syx_bytecode_push_constant (self->bytecode, SYX_BYTECODE_CONST_TRUE);
00402       return FALSE;
00403     }
00404   else if (!strcmp (name, "false"))
00405     {
00406       syx_bytecode_push_constant (self->bytecode, SYX_BYTECODE_CONST_FALSE);
00407       return FALSE;
00408     }
00409   else if (!strcmp (name, "thisContext"))
00410     {
00411       syx_bytecode_push_constant (self->bytecode, SYX_BYTECODE_CONST_CONTEXT);
00412       return FALSE;
00413     }
00414 
00415   pos = _syx_parser_find_argument_name (self, name);
00416   if (pos >= 0)
00417     {
00418       syx_bytecode_push_argument (self->bytecode, pos + 1);
00419       return FALSE;    
00420     }
00421 
00422   pos = _syx_parser_find_temporary_name (self, name);
00423   if (pos >= 0)
00424     {
00425       syx_bytecode_push_temporary (self->bytecode, pos);
00426       return FALSE;
00427     }
00428 
00429   pos = _syx_parser_find_instance_name (self, name);
00430   if (pos >= 0)
00431     {
00432       syx_bytecode_push_instance (self->bytecode, pos);
00433       return FALSE;
00434     }
00435 
00436   binding = _syx_parser_find_class_variable_name (self, name);
00437   if (!SYX_IS_NIL (binding))
00438     syx_bytecode_push_binding_variable (self->bytecode, binding);
00439   else
00440     syx_bytecode_push_binding_variable (self->bytecode,
00441                                         syx_dictionary_binding_at_symbol (syx_globals, name));
00442 
00443   return FALSE;
00444 }
00445 
00446 static void
00447 _syx_parser_parse_primitive (SyxParser *self)
00448 {
00449   SyxToken token = syx_lexer_get_last_token (self->lexer);
00450   syx_int32 prim_index;
00451 
00452   SYX_METHOD_PRIMITIVE(self->method) = syx_small_integer_new (-1);
00453 
00454   if (! (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_BINARY && !strcmp (token.value.string, "<")))
00455     return;
00456   syx_token_free (token);
00457 
00458   token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00459   if (token.type != SYX_TOKEN_NAME_COLON)
00460     syx_signal (SYX_ERROR_INTERP, syx_string_new ("Expected name colon"));
00461 
00462   if (!strcmp (token.value.string, "primitive:"))
00463     {
00464       syx_token_free (token);
00465 
00466       token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00467       if (token.type != SYX_TOKEN_STR_CONST)
00468         syx_signal (SYX_ERROR_INTERP, syx_string_new ("Expected a string containing the primitive to be called"));
00469       
00470       prim_index = syx_primitive_get_index (token.value.string);
00471       if (prim_index < 0)
00472         syx_signal (SYX_ERROR_INTERP, syx_string_new ("Unknown primitive named", token.value.string));
00473       syx_token_free (token);
00474       
00475       token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00476       if (! (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_BINARY && !strcmp (token.value.string, ">")))
00477         syx_signal (SYX_ERROR_INTERP, syx_string_new ("Expected >"));
00478       syx_token_free (token);
00479       
00480       SYX_METHOD_PRIMITIVE (self->method) = syx_small_integer_new (prim_index);
00481       
00482       syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00483     }
00484   else if (!strcmp (token.value.string, "cCall:"))
00485     {
00486       syx_token_free (token);
00487       
00488       token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00489 
00490       if (token.type != SYX_TOKEN_STR_CONST)
00491         syx_signal (SYX_ERROR_INTERP, syx_string_new ("Expected a string containing the primitive to be called"));
00492       syx_bytecode_gen_literal (self->bytecode, syx_symbol_new (token.value.string));
00493       syx_token_free (token);
00494 
00495       token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00496       if (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_BINARY && !strcmp (token.value.string, ">"))
00497         {
00498           syx_token_free (token);
00499           syx_bytecode_gen_literal (self->bytecode, syx_nil);
00500           SYX_METHOD_PRIMITIVE (self->method) = syx_small_integer_new (-2);
00501           syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00502           return;
00503         }
00504 
00505       if (! (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_NAME_COLON && !strcmp (token.value.string, "plugin:")))
00506         syx_signal (SYX_ERROR_INTERP, syx_string_new ("Expected plugin:"));
00507       syx_token_free (token);
00508 
00509       token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00510       if (token.type != SYX_TOKEN_STR_CONST)
00511         syx_signal (SYX_ERROR_INTERP, syx_string_new ("Expected a string containing the plugin name"));
00512       syx_bytecode_gen_literal (self->bytecode, syx_symbol_new (token.value.string));
00513       syx_token_free (token);
00514 
00515       token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00516       if (! (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_BINARY && !strcmp (token.value.string, ">")))
00517         syx_signal (SYX_ERROR_INTERP, syx_string_new ("Expected >"));
00518       syx_token_free (token);
00519 
00520       syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00521 
00522       SYX_METHOD_PRIMITIVE(self->method) = syx_small_integer_new (-2);
00523     }
00524   else
00525     syx_signal (SYX_ERROR_INTERP, syx_string_new ("Expected primitive or cCall"));
00526 
00527   return;
00528 }
00529 
00530 static void
00531 _syx_parser_parse_temporaries (SyxParser *self)
00532 {
00533   SyxToken token = syx_lexer_get_last_token (self->lexer);
00534   SyxParserScope *scope = self->_temporary_scopes + self->_temporary_scopes_top;
00535 
00536   if (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_BINARY && !strcmp (token.value.string, "|"))
00537     {
00538       syx_token_free (token);
00539       token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00540       while (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_NAME_CONST)
00541         {
00542           scope->stack[scope->top++] = syx_strdup (token.value.string);
00543           syx_token_free (token);
00544           token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00545         }
00546       if (! (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_BINARY && !strcmp (token.value.string, "|")))
00547         syx_signal (SYX_ERROR_INTERP, syx_string_new ("Temporary list not terminated by bar"));
00548       syx_token_free (token);
00549 
00550       syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00551     }
00552     
00553   /* we choose the maximum number so we can hold all the temporaries without forgetting
00554      previous parsed optimized blocks. */
00555   if (SYX_IS_NIL (SYX_CODE_TEMPORARIES_COUNT (self->method))
00556       || scope->top > SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (SYX_CODE_TEMPORARIES_COUNT (self->method)))
00557     SYX_CODE_TEMPORARIES_COUNT(self->method) = syx_small_integer_new (scope->top);
00558 }
00559 
00560 static void
00561 _syx_parser_parse_body (SyxParser *self)
00562 {
00563   SyxToken token = syx_lexer_get_last_token (self->lexer);
00564 
00565   while (TRUE)
00566     {
00567       while (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_CLOSING)
00568         {
00569           if (self->_in_block && token.value.character == ']')
00570             return;
00571           
00572           if (token.value.character == '.')
00573             {
00574               token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00575               /* Do not pop from the stack multiple times */
00576               if (token.type != SYX_TOKEN_CLOSING && token.type != SYX_TOKEN_END)
00577                 syx_bytecode_pop_top (self->bytecode);
00578             }
00579           else
00580             token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00581         }
00582 
00583       if (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_END)
00584         break;
00585 
00586       _syx_parser_parse_statement (self);
00587       token = syx_lexer_get_last_token (self->lexer);
00588     }
00589 
00590   if (self->_in_block)
00591     syx_signal (SYX_ERROR_INTERP, syx_string_new ("Expected ] after block body"));
00592 }
00593 
00594 static void
00595 _syx_parser_parse_statement (SyxParser *self)
00596 {
00597   SyxToken token = syx_lexer_get_last_token (self->lexer);
00598 
00599   if (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_BINARY && !strcmp (token.value.string, "^"))
00600     {
00601       syx_token_free (token);
00602       syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00603       _syx_parser_parse_expression (self);
00604       syx_bytecode_do_special (self->bytecode, SYX_BYTECODE_STACK_RETURN);
00605     }
00606   else
00607     _syx_parser_parse_expression (self);
00608 }
00609 
00610 static void
00611 _syx_parser_parse_expression (SyxParser *self)
00612 {
00613   SyxToken token = syx_lexer_get_last_token (self->lexer);
00614   syx_string assign_name;
00615   syx_bool super_term = FALSE;
00616 
00617   if (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_NAME_CONST)
00618     {
00619       assign_name = syx_strdup (token.value.string);
00620       syx_token_free (token);
00621 
00622       token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00623       if (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_BINARY &&
00624           (!strcmp (token.value.string, ":=") || !strcmp (token.value.string, "<-")))
00625         {
00626           syx_token_free (token);
00627           syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00628           _syx_parser_parse_assignment (self, assign_name);
00629         }
00630       else /* Not an assignment, let it be a name term then */
00631         super_term = _syx_parser_parse_name_term (self, assign_name);
00632 
00633       syx_free (assign_name);
00634     }
00635   else
00636     super_term = _syx_parser_parse_term (self);
00637 
00638   /* After we got the initial object, we can do message continuation on it
00639      specifying if 'super' has been requested instead of self */
00640   _syx_parser_do_continuation (self, super_term);
00641 }
00642 
00643 static void
00644 _syx_parser_parse_assignment (SyxParser *self, syx_symbol assign_name)
00645 {
00646   syx_varsize pos;
00647   SyxOop binding;
00648 
00649   pos = _syx_parser_find_temporary_name (self, assign_name);
00650   if (pos >= 0)
00651     {
00652       _syx_parser_parse_expression (self);
00653       syx_bytecode_assign_temporary (self->bytecode, pos);
00654       return;
00655     }
00656 
00657   pos = _syx_parser_find_instance_name (self, assign_name);
00658   if (pos >= 0)
00659     {
00660       _syx_parser_parse_expression (self);
00661       syx_bytecode_assign_instance (self->bytecode, pos);
00662       return;
00663     }
00664 
00665   binding = _syx_parser_find_class_variable_name (self, assign_name);
00666   if (!SYX_IS_NIL (binding))
00667     {
00668       _syx_parser_parse_expression (self);
00669       syx_bytecode_assign_binding_variable (self->bytecode, binding);
00670       return;
00671     }
00672   
00673   syx_signal (SYX_ERROR_INTERP, syx_string_new ("Unassignable variable named: %s\n", assign_name));
00674 }
00675 
00676 static void
00677 _syx_parser_do_continuation (SyxParser *self, syx_bool super_receiver)
00678 {
00679   SyxToken token;
00680   self->_duplicate_indexes_top++;
00681 
00682   super_receiver = _syx_parser_do_key_continuation (self, super_receiver);
00683   
00684   token = syx_lexer_get_last_token (self->lexer);
00685   while (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_CLOSING && token.value.character == ';')
00686     {
00687       syx_bytecode_duplicate_at (self->bytecode, self->_duplicate_indexes[self->_duplicate_indexes_top - 1]);
00688       syx_bytecode_pop_top (self->bytecode);
00689       syx_token_free (token);
00690       syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00691       _syx_parser_do_key_continuation (self, super_receiver);
00692       token = syx_lexer_get_last_token (self->lexer);
00693     }
00694 
00695   self->_duplicate_indexes_top--;
00696 }
00697 
00698 static syx_varsize
00699 _syx_parser_parse_optimized_block (SyxParser *self, SyxBytecodeSpecial branch_type, syx_bool do_pop)
00700 {
00701   syx_int8 scope_top;
00702   syx_uint16 jump;
00703   syx_bool block_state;
00704   SyxToken token;
00705   syx_int32 i;
00706 
00707   syx_bytecode_do_special (self->bytecode, branch_type);
00708   syx_bytecode_gen_code (self->bytecode, 0);
00709   jump = self->bytecode->code_top - 1;
00710 
00711   if (do_pop)
00712     syx_bytecode_pop_top (self->bytecode);
00713   
00714   block_state = self->_in_block;
00715   self->_in_block = TRUE;
00716 
00717   token = syx_lexer_get_last_token (self->lexer);
00718   if (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_BINARY && !strcmp (token.value.string, "["))
00719     {
00720       syx_token_free (token);
00721       syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00722       /* we need to restore the current scope after the optimized block has been parsed */
00723       scope_top = self->_temporary_scopes[self->_temporary_scopes_top].top;
00724       _syx_parser_parse_temporaries (self);
00725       _syx_parser_parse_body (self);
00726       for (i=scope_top; i < self->_temporary_scopes[self->_temporary_scopes_top].top; i++)
00727         syx_free (self->_temporary_scopes[self->_temporary_scopes_top].stack[i]);
00728       self->_temporary_scopes[self->_temporary_scopes_top].top = scope_top;
00729       token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00730     }
00731   else
00732     {
00733       /* a variable or such has been used, like ifTrue: trueBlock */
00734       _syx_parser_do_binary_continuation (self, _syx_parser_parse_term (self), FALSE);
00735       syx_bytecode_gen_message (self->bytecode, FALSE, 0, "value");
00736     }
00737 
00738   self->_in_block = block_state;
00739   self->bytecode->code[jump] = SYX_COMPAT_SWAP_16 (self->bytecode->code_top);
00740   return jump;
00741 }
00742 
00743 static syx_bool
00744 _syx_parser_do_key_continuation (SyxParser *self, syx_bool super_receiver)
00745 {
00746   SyxToken token;
00747   syx_char selector[256] = {0};
00748   syx_int8 num_args;
00749   syx_bool super_term;
00750   syx_uint16 jump, conditionJump, loopJump;
00751   SyxBytecodeSpecial branchType;
00752 
00753   super_receiver = _syx_parser_do_binary_continuation (self, super_receiver, TRUE);
00754 
00755   token = syx_lexer_get_last_token (self->lexer);
00756   if (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_NAME_COLON)
00757     {
00758       self->_duplicate_indexes[self->_duplicate_indexes_top - 1] = self->bytecode->code_top;
00759       
00760       if (!strcmp (token.value.string, "ifTrue:"))
00761         {
00762           syx_token_free (token);
00763           token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00764           jump = _syx_parser_parse_optimized_block (self, SYX_BYTECODE_BRANCH_IF_TRUE, FALSE);
00765 
00766           token = syx_lexer_get_last_token (self->lexer);
00767           if (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_NAME_COLON && !strcmp (token.value.string, "ifFalse:"))
00768             {
00769               syx_token_free (token);
00770               token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00771               
00772               /* skip ifFalse: block if condition is true */
00773               syx_bytecode_do_special (self->bytecode, SYX_BYTECODE_BRANCH);
00774               syx_bytecode_gen_code (self->bytecode, 0);
00775               conditionJump = self->bytecode->code_top - 1;
00776 
00777               /* jump here if condition is false */
00778               self->bytecode->code[jump] = SYX_COMPAT_SWAP_16 (self->bytecode->code_top);
00779               jump = _syx_parser_parse_optimized_block (self, SYX_BYTECODE_BRANCH, TRUE);
00780               /* We don't need any jump after ifFalse: */
00781               self->bytecode->code[jump] = 0;
00782 
00783               /* jump here if condition was true */
00784               self->bytecode->code[conditionJump] = SYX_COMPAT_SWAP_16 (self->bytecode->code_top);
00785             }
00786 
00787           return FALSE;
00788         }
00789       else if (!strcmp (token.value.string, "ifFalse:"))
00790         {
00791           syx_token_free (token);
00792           token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00793           jump = _syx_parser_parse_optimized_block (self, SYX_BYTECODE_BRANCH_IF_FALSE, FALSE);
00794 
00795           token = syx_lexer_get_last_token (self->lexer);
00796           if (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_NAME_COLON && !strcmp (token.value.string, "ifTrue:"))
00797             {
00798               syx_token_free (token);
00799               token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00800 
00801               /* skip ifTrue: block if condition is false */
00802               syx_bytecode_do_special (self->bytecode, SYX_BYTECODE_BRANCH);
00803               syx_bytecode_gen_code (self->bytecode, 0);
00804               conditionJump = self->bytecode->code_top - 1;
00805 
00806               /* jump here if condition is true */
00807               self->bytecode->code[jump] = SYX_COMPAT_SWAP_16 (self->bytecode->code_top);
00808               jump = _syx_parser_parse_optimized_block (self, SYX_BYTECODE_BRANCH, TRUE);
00809               /* We don't need any jump after ifFalse: */
00810               self->bytecode->code[jump] = 0;
00811 
00812               /* jump here if condition was false */
00813               self->bytecode->code[conditionJump] = SYX_COMPAT_SWAP_16 (self->bytecode->code_top);
00814             }
00815 
00816           return FALSE;
00817         }
00818       else if (!strcmp (token.value.string, "whileTrue:") || !strcmp (token.value.string, "whileFalse:"))
00819         {
00820           if (!strcmp (token.value.string, "whileTrue:"))
00821             branchType = SYX_BYTECODE_BRANCH_IF_TRUE;
00822           else
00823             branchType = SYX_BYTECODE_BRANCH_IF_FALSE;
00824 
00825           syx_token_free (token);
00826           token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00827           loopJump = self->bytecode->code_top;
00828           syx_bytecode_do_special (self->bytecode, SYX_BYTECODE_DUPLICATE);
00829           syx_bytecode_gen_message (self->bytecode, FALSE, 0, "value");
00830           conditionJump = _syx_parser_parse_optimized_block (self, branchType, FALSE);
00831           syx_bytecode_pop_top (self->bytecode);
00832           syx_bytecode_do_special (self->bytecode, SYX_BYTECODE_BRANCH);
00833           syx_bytecode_gen_code (self->bytecode, loopJump);
00834           self->bytecode->code[conditionJump] = SYX_COMPAT_SWAP_16 (self->bytecode->code_top);
00835           syx_bytecode_pop_top (self->bytecode);
00836 
00837           return FALSE;
00838         }
00839 
00840       num_args = 0;
00841       while (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_NAME_COLON)
00842         {
00843           strcat (selector, token.value.string);
00844           num_args++;
00845           syx_token_free (token);
00846           syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00847 
00848           super_term = _syx_parser_parse_term (self);
00849           _syx_parser_do_binary_continuation (self, super_term, FALSE);
00850 
00851           token = syx_lexer_get_last_token (self->lexer);
00852         }
00853 
00854       syx_bytecode_gen_message (self->bytecode, super_receiver, num_args, selector);
00855 
00856       return FALSE;
00857     }
00858   return super_receiver;
00859 }
00860 
00861 static syx_bool
00862 _syx_parser_do_binary_continuation (SyxParser *self, syx_bool super_receiver, syx_bool do_cascade)
00863 {
00864   syx_string selector;
00865   SyxToken token;
00866   syx_bool super_term;
00867 
00868   super_receiver = _syx_parser_do_unary_continuation (self, super_receiver, do_cascade);
00869 
00870   token = syx_lexer_get_last_token (self->lexer);
00871   while (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_BINARY)
00872     {
00873       selector = syx_strdup (token.value.string);
00874       
00875       if (do_cascade)
00876         {
00877           self->_duplicate_indexes[self->_duplicate_indexes_top - 1] = self->bytecode->code_top;
00878           do_cascade = FALSE;
00879         }
00880 
00881       syx_token_free (token);
00882       syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00883       super_term = _syx_parser_parse_term (self);
00884       _syx_parser_do_unary_continuation (self, super_term, FALSE);
00885       token = syx_lexer_get_last_token (self->lexer);
00886 
00887       syx_bytecode_gen_message (self->bytecode, super_receiver, 1, selector);
00888       syx_free (selector);
00889     }
00890 
00891   return super_receiver;
00892 }
00893 
00894 static syx_bool
00895 _syx_parser_do_unary_continuation (SyxParser *self, syx_bool super_receiver, syx_bool do_cascade)
00896 {
00897   SyxToken token = syx_lexer_get_last_token (self->lexer);
00898 
00899   while (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_NAME_CONST)
00900     {
00901       if (do_cascade)
00902         self->_duplicate_indexes[self->_duplicate_indexes_top - 1] = self->bytecode->code_top;
00903 
00904       syx_bytecode_gen_message (self->bytecode, super_receiver,
00905                                 0, token.value.string);
00906       syx_token_free (token);
00907 
00908       token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00909       super_receiver = FALSE;
00910     }
00911 
00912   return super_receiver;
00913 }
00914 
00915 static void
00916 _syx_parser_parse_block (SyxParser *self)
00917 {
00918   SyxOop closure;
00919   SyxOop old_method = self->method;
00920   SyxBytecode *old_bytecode = self->bytecode;
00921   syx_bool block_state = self->_in_block;
00922   syx_token_free (syx_lexer_get_last_token (self->lexer));
00923 
00924   self->method = syx_block_new ();
00925   self->bytecode = syx_bytecode_new ();
00926   self->_in_block = TRUE;
00927   self->_temporary_scopes_top++;
00928   self->_argument_scopes_top++;
00929 
00930   syx_parser_parse (self, FALSE);
00931 
00932   closure = syx_block_closure_new (self->method);
00933   self->method = old_method;
00934   syx_bytecode_free (self->bytecode);
00935   self->bytecode = old_bytecode;
00936   self->_in_block = block_state;
00937   self->_temporary_scopes_top--;
00938   self->_argument_scopes_top--;
00939 
00940   syx_bytecode_push_block_closure (self->bytecode, closure);
00941 }
00942 
00943 static void
00944 _syx_parser_parse_array (SyxParser *self)
00945 {
00946   syx_varsize num_elements = 0;
00947   SyxToken token = syx_lexer_get_last_token (self->lexer);
00948 
00949   syx_token_free (token);
00950   token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00951   while (! (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_END || (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_CLOSING && token.value.character == '}')))
00952     {
00953       _syx_parser_parse_expression (self);
00954       num_elements++;
00955       token = syx_lexer_get_last_token (self->lexer);
00956       if (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_CLOSING && token.value.character == '.')
00957         token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00958     }
00959 
00960   syx_bytecode_push_array (self->bytecode, num_elements);
00961 }
00962 
00963 static SyxOop 
00964 _syx_parser_parse_literal_array (SyxParser *self)
00965 {
00966   SyxOop elements[256];
00967   syx_varsize top = 0;
00968   SyxToken token;
00969 
00970   token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
00971   while (! (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_END || (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_CLOSING && token.value.character == ')')))
00972     {
00973       switch (token.type)
00974         {
00975         case SYX_TOKEN_ARRAY_BEGIN:
00976           elements[top++] = _syx_parser_parse_literal_array (self);
00977           break;
00978         case SYX_TOKEN_INT_CONST:
00979           elements[top++] = syx_small_integer_new (token.value.integer);
00980           break;
00981         case SYX_TOKEN_BINARY:
00982           if (!strcmp (token.value.string, "("))
00983             {
00984               elements[top++] = _syx_parser_parse_literal_array (self);
00985               syx_token_free (token);
00986               break;
00987             }
00988         case SYX_TOKEN_NAME_CONST:
00989         case SYX_TOKEN_NAME_COLON:
00990         case SYX_TOKEN_SYM_CONST:
00991           elements[top++] = syx_symbol_new (token.value.string);
00992           syx_token_free (token);
00993           break;
00994         case SYX_TOKEN_STR_CONST:
00995           elements[top++] = syx_string_new (token.value.string);
00996           syx_token_free (token);
00997           break;
00998         case SYX_TOKEN_CHAR_CONST:
00999           elements[top++] = syx_character_new (token.value.character);
01000           break;
01001         default:
01002           syx_signal (SYX_ERROR_INTERP, syx_string_new ("Illegal text in literal array\n"));
01003           break;
01004         }
01005 
01006       token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
01007     }
01008 
01009   return syx_array_new_ref (top, elements);
01010 }
01011 
01012 static void
01013 _syx_parser_parse_method_message_pattern (SyxParser *self)
01014 {
01015   SyxToken token = syx_lexer_get_last_token (self->lexer);
01016   syx_char selector[0xFF] = {0};
01017   SyxParserScope *scope = self->_argument_scopes + self->_argument_scopes_top;
01018 
01019   switch (token.type)
01020     {
01021     case SYX_TOKEN_NAME_CONST:
01022       /* Unary message pattern */
01023       SYX_METHOD_SELECTOR(self->method) = syx_symbol_new (token.value.string);
01024       syx_token_free (token);
01025 
01026       syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
01027       break;
01028     case SYX_TOKEN_BINARY:
01029       /* Binary message pattern */
01030       SYX_METHOD_SELECTOR(self->method) = syx_symbol_new (token.value.string);
01031       syx_token_free (token);
01032 
01033       token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
01034       if (token.type != SYX_TOKEN_NAME_CONST)
01035         syx_signal (SYX_ERROR_INTERP, syx_string_new ("Expected name constant for argument name\n"));
01036       scope->stack[scope->top++] = syx_strdup (token.value.string);
01037       syx_token_free (token);
01038 
01039       syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
01040       break;
01041     case SYX_TOKEN_NAME_COLON:
01042       /* Keyword message pattern */
01043       while (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_NAME_COLON)
01044         {
01045           strcat (selector, token.value.string);
01046           syx_token_free (token);
01047 
01048           token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
01049           if (token.type != SYX_TOKEN_NAME_CONST)
01050             syx_signal (SYX_ERROR_INTERP, syx_string_new ("Expected name constant for argument name\n"));
01051           scope->stack[scope->top++] = syx_strdup (token.value.string);
01052           syx_token_free (token);
01053 
01054           token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
01055         }
01056       
01057       SYX_METHOD_SELECTOR(self->method) = syx_symbol_new (selector);
01058       break;
01059     default:
01060       syx_signal (SYX_ERROR_INTERP, syx_string_new ("Invalid message pattern\n"));
01061     }
01062 
01063   SYX_CODE_ARGUMENTS_COUNT(self->method) = syx_small_integer_new (scope->top);
01064 }
01065 
01066 static void
01067 _syx_parser_parse_block_message_pattern (SyxParser *self)
01068 {
01069   SyxToken token = syx_lexer_get_last_token (self->lexer);
01070   SyxParserScope *scope = self->_argument_scopes + self->_argument_scopes_top;
01071 
01072   if (! (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_BINARY && !strcmp (token.value.string, ":")))
01073     {
01074       SYX_CODE_ARGUMENTS_COUNT(self->method) = syx_small_integer_new (0);
01075       return;
01076     }
01077 
01078   while (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_BINARY && !strcmp (token.value.string, ":"))
01079     {
01080       syx_token_free (token);
01081       token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
01082       assert (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_NAME_CONST);
01083       scope->stack[scope->top++] = syx_strdup (token.value.string);
01084       syx_token_free (token);
01085 
01086       token = syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
01087     }
01088 
01089   if (! (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_BINARY && !strcmp (token.value.string, "|")))
01090     syx_signal (SYX_ERROR_INTERP, syx_string_new ("Expected | after block message pattern\n"));
01091 
01092   syx_token_free (token);
01093   syx_lexer_next_token (self->lexer);
01094 
01095   SYX_CODE_ARGUMENTS_COUNT(self->method) = syx_small_integer_new (scope->top);
01096   return;
01097 }
01098 
01099 static void
01100 _syx_parser_parse_message_pattern (SyxParser *self)
01101 {
01102   if (self->_in_block)
01103     _syx_parser_parse_block_message_pattern (self);
01104   else
01105     _syx_parser_parse_method_message_pattern (self);
01106 }
Documented by Luca Bruno and ScaccoMatto
